abstract: Canadian Prime Min Stephen Harper's government says country will cut greenhouse emissions by 30 percent below 2005 levels by 2030 and that it has formally submitted this goal to United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Stephen Harper’s government said Friday that Canada would reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 30 percent below 2005 levels by 2030.

headline.main: Canada: Pledge Sent to U.N. to Reduce Greenhouse Gas Emissions by 2030
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Pledge Sent to U.N. to Reduce Greenhouse Gas Emissions by 2030

snippet: Prime Minister Stephen Harper’s government said Friday that Canada would reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 30 percent below 2005 levels by 2030.

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
